title: Design for Printed Fabric-Quatrafoil, Series #625-630
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite, colored tissue paper mounted on white cardboard
description: Eight vertical rows of small, four petaled flower motifs made from pink, light blue, blue, green, brown and red colored tissue paper arranged inside a ruled grid.
name: drawing and collage
